Package org.cesecore.certificates.ca.internal

Interface SernoGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SernoGeneratorRandom
    public interface SernoGenerator
    Interface for a serial number generator.
    Version:
    $Id: SernoGenerator.java 31882 2019-03-18 13:50:56Z anatom $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      int getNoSernoBytes()
      Returns the number of serial number bytes generated by this generator.

    • Method Detail

      • getSerno

        BigInteger getSerno()
        Generates a number of serial number bytes.
        Returns:
        an array of serial number bytes.

      • getNoSernoBytes

        int getNoSernoBytes()
        Returns the number of serial number bytes generated by this generator.
        Returns:
        The number of serial number bytes generated by this generator.

      • setSeed

        void setSeed​(long seed)
        Sets an optional seed needed by the serno generator. This can be different things, for a sequential generator it can for instance be the first number to be generated and for a random generator it can be a random seed. The constructor may seed the generator enough so this method may not be nessecary to call.
        Parameters:
        seed - the seed used to initilize the serno generator.

      • setAlgorithm

        void setAlgorithm​(String algo)
           throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Set the algorithm used for the serial number generator, if needed to set. Usually a default value is provided for your serial number generator. This can be used to override/change default values. Usage must consider multi-threaded behavior.
        Parameters:
        algo - an (optional) algorithm for a serial number generator implementation
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the requesed algorithm cannot be found
